summary: The 'All-Americans Tax Relief Act of 2025' proposes several tax reforms. Key provisions include expanding the Earned Income Tax Credit (EITC), making the child tax credit fully refundable, expanding the medical expense deduction, and introducing new deductions for daycare, commuting, and tutoring expenses, credit card interest, and rent. It also excludes discharge of indebtedness for individuals and increases the capital gains tax rate.
